text: Jean Leonetti (born 9 July 1948) is a French politician, and former president of The Republicans. He represented Alpes-Maritimes's 7th constituency at the National Assembly from 1997 to 2011 and again from 2012 to 2017, as a member of the Radical Party, although he represented the UMP party as its Vice- President at the National Assembly. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Aix-Marseille University alumni Category:People from Marseille Category:French people of Italian descent Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Union for French Democracy politicians Category:Radical Party (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Modern and Humanist France Category:Government ministers of France Category:French physicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur Category:Mayors of places in Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur
title: Jean Leonetti
